it.gmariotti.cardslib.library.internal
Class CardHeader

java.lang.Object
  it.gmariotti.cardslib.library.internal.base.BaseCard
      it.gmariotti.cardslib.library.internal.CardHeader
All Implemented Interfaces:
CardUIInferface
public class CardHeader
extends BaseCard

Card Header Model.

You can customize this component. See https://github.com/gabrielemariotti/cardslib/tree/master/doc/HEADER.md for more information.

You can fully customize this component with:
  • using your innerLayout in constructor
  • setting your elements with setupInnerViewElements(android.view.ViewGroup, android.view.View) method.

Usage: 

     //Create a Card
     Card card = new Card(getContext());

     //Create a CardHeader
     CardHeader header = new CardHeader(getContext());

     //Add header to card
     card.addCardHeader(header);

You can customize buttons behaviour with setButtonOverflowVisible(boolean) ,setButtonExpandVisible(boolean), setOtherButtonVisible(boolean)

You can attach a Popup Menu to overflowMenu with setPopupMenu(int, CardHeader.OnClickCardHeaderPopupMenuListener) 

     header.setPopupMenu(R.menu.popupmain, new CardHeader.OnClickCardHeaderPopupMenuListener(){

     public void onMenuItemClick(BaseCard card, MenuItem item) {
     mPopupMenuListener.doSomething(...);
     }
     });

You can attach a CardHeader.OnClickCardHeaderOtherButtonListener to button to listen any callback when other button is clicked. 

     header.setOtherButtonClickListener(new CardHeader.OnClickCardHeaderOtherButtonListener() {

     public void onButtonItemClick(Card card, View view) {
     //do something...
     }
     });

Use your style and drawable files to customize buttons style.

Also you can use a different header layout using a custom attr in main card layout.

Method Detail

setPopupMenu

public void setPopupMenu(int menuRes,
                         CardHeader.OnClickCardHeaderPopupMenuListener listener)
Sets a popup menu for overflow button.

Setting the menu resource to -1 disables the menu for this card.

Parameters:
menuRes - The menu resource ID to use for the card's popup menu.
listener - A listener invoked when an option in the popup menu is tapped by the user.

getInnerView

public android.view.View getInnerView(android.content.Context context,
                                      android.view.ViewGroup parent)
Inflates the inner layout and adds to parent layout. Then calls setupInnerViewElements(android.view.ViewGroup, android.view.View) method to setup all values.

You can provide your custom layout. You can use a xml layout with BaseCard.setInnerLayout(int) or with constructor CardHeader(android.content.Context, int). Then customize #setupInnerViewElements to set your values.

Specified by:
getInnerView in interface CardUIInferface
Overrides:
getInnerView in class BaseCard
Parameters:
context - context
parent - Inner Layout
Returns:
view

setupInnerViewElements

public void setupInnerViewElements(android.view.ViewGroup parent,
                                   android.view.View view)
This method sets values to header elements and customizes view. Override this method to set your elements inside InnerView.

Parameters:
parent - parent view (Inner Frame)
view - Inner View
